title: AutoDev Origin and Vision
summary: AutoDev automates planner/coder loops with persistent narrative to prevent rework and preserve intent.

details.problem: LLMs repeat work without durable memory; context is limited.
details.solution: Append-only story log + context_view digests + STORY:<id> code markers.
details.scope: portable automation loop dropped into any repo
